Name: Mortars VR
About the game: Operate your cannon tower in VR, spot your enemy, take aim, calculate wind, distance, trajectory and velocity then fire and watch your bullet take flight and hit itâ€™s mark. Grow taller and stronger as you destroy other players. Forge alliances to topple the strong or sneak your way up to the top. All-out artillery warfare, up to four players either in online multiplayer or single player with bots. Choose from five different tower classes, each having their own unique weapons. An arsenal of fifteen different weapons to destroy your enemies with. Key Features 5 Tower Classes. Play as the Bombardier, Builder, Marksman, Troller or Science. 15 crazy weapons of mass destruction to master. 3 maps, each requiring unique strategy.
